body:
i’m thankful for roast beef sandwiches and discounted grocery store pecan rolls.

i’m thankful that it was very windy today, which meant miso got to play the best level yet of her favorite game, hunting leaves animated by breeze.

i’m thankful for the original ‘mirror’s edge,’ which is one of my favorite video games.

i’m thankful for kh, who described the roof over her front doorstep as a “baby roof”

i’m thankful that though in the afternoon i got frustrated with an annoying build error, this morning i got a lot of structural work done.

i’m thankful that d and i had productive discussions about moving.

i’m thankful we were both scratching miso at the same time and miso got so relaxed she farted.

i’m thankful for isaac asimov’s ‘foundation,’ which i look forward to reading every night before bed.
normalized_markdown:
i’m thankful for roast beef sandwiches and discounted grocery store pecan rolls.

i’m thankful that it was very windy today, which meant miso got to play the best level yet of her favorite game, hunting leaves animated by breeze.

i’m thankful for the original ‘mirror’s edge,’ which is one of my favorite video games.

i’m thankful for kh, who described the roof over her front doorstep as a “baby roof”

i’m thankful that though in the afternoon i got frustrated with an annoying build error, this morning i got a lot of structural work done.

i’m thankful that d and i had productive discussions about moving.

i’m thankful we were both scratching miso at the same time and miso got so relaxed she farted.

i’m thankful for isaac asimov’s ‘foundation,’ which i look forward to reading every night before bed.
